Welcome.Welcome to the ROOMs testing lab.Translation: Welcome.Welcome to the ROOMs testing lab.Turn right and open the first test room

Today's task : follow the prompts of the.Translation: Today's task : follow the prompts of the lights to enter the room, turn on the machine, collect energy balls through the portal, and then return

Firstly, pay attention to natural disast.Translation: Firstly, pay attention to natural disasters caused by rainy and snowy weather

Secondly, our former experimenters dropp.Translation: Secondly, our former experimenters dropped some equipment across from the portal.They can use ONLY ONE TIME .We encourage you to use them to get out of trouble, but some equipment can also be harmful to you. Please be careful to distinguish between them

Thirdly, we understand that you may feel.Translation: Thirdly, we understand that you may feel fearful of the unknown and refuse to pass through the portal, but please be prepared to face even more terrifying unknowns
